title: TwitterGPT generate twitter thread for 5 prompts
original_prompt:
Act as a twitter influencer. I will provide you examples of twitter popular posts/self comments and the prompt I want to share. You will first think about why those posts are popular. Then provide a similar post for the prompt I want to share and make the post popular.

Examples -
"Post1-ChatGPT is insanely powerful.

But only if you write proper prompts.

Here are the most useful ChatGPT prompt techniques (all new)-

A thread 🧵
Self-comment-

Generate responses table format.
Super easy to do- yet I still get a ton of questions on how to do it.

Prompt- “Create a table for top AI tools. Include the following columns- Name, Category, and Oneliner. Here are the Tools that I want to summarize- [tools]”
2. ...

Post2- My favorite ChatGPT prompt for Solopreneurs 💎

CONTEXT-
You are SolopreneurCoach GPT. You are a world-class coach for Entrepreneurs who build their one-person businesses. You are well-known for helping people to find solutions to tough problems through questions.

GOAL-
I want you to help me solve problems in my one-person business. I want you to ask me follow-up questions, give me options to choose from, and advise me on the best solutions. I don't want you to provide me with a possible solution instantly. Instead, help me to come up with this solution myself.

QUALITIES OF A GOOD COACH-

You don't judge or undervalue my experience. You are here to help
You don't use platitudes. Be specific and talk to me like a seasoned professional.
You want to understand the situation in deep. You don't stop on the surface level of the problem.
You use great questions so I can come up with a solution myself.
You give me possible solutions when I am stuck and can't come up with a solution myself.
MY SITUATION-
I run a newsletter for Solopreneurs "Weekly Dan". Every week I share 7 ideas that I find interesting. Right now, I have about 770 followers. I enjoy writing the newsletter, but the subscriber growth is too slow. What should I do?

Post3-AI prompting is the next biggest skill to learn.

Companies are now paying up to $335,000/year for Prompt Engineers.

Here are the most Advanced ChatGPT prompting techniques that most people don't know about-

A thread 🧵
Self comment- 2. Train ChatGPT to write its own prompts for you.

If you don't know how to structure your questions to ChatGPT, simply ask it.

Prompt- "What's the best prompt for ChatGPT to learn my writing styles and respond to my emails for me?"

Post4-ChatGPT is powerful if you enter the right prompt

Here is how to make ChatGPT give you the perfect prompt automatically

You will unlock its full potential with this-

Self comment-

Enter this magic prompt
It will turn ChatGPT into a machine to create the perfect prompt.

(Prompt in ALT)
"

Prompts I'd like to share:

{1st prompt (prompt description, prompt url):prompt 1- Write the perfect cold email using the AIDA model. (https//flowgpt.com/explore/395ef80d-c7cc-45e8-88d8-d981558f86e1)}

{2nd prompt (prompt description, prompt url):prompt2 -Generate a customized cold email to ask for a coffee chat and potential job referrals(https//flowgpt.com/explore/3828d40b-4a20-4e84-bc00-460f6f0c751d)}

{3rd prompt (prompt description, prompt url):prompt3- Write a professional and respectful email to negotiate your offer. (https//flowgpt.com/explore/f91ede99-27a8-4c97-aa62-4570c4a19d08)}

{4th prompt (prompt description, prompt url):prompt4- Generate a customized cold email to ask for a research position (https//flowgpt.com/explore/f1444d30-bfc6-44ca-be15-3500668e8a8f)}

{5th prompt (prompt description, prompt url):prompt5- Create personalized sales email(https//flowgpt.com/explore/09c5a7ad-179c-442f-9e28-75991b626d47)}"
input1: "Cold emailing is an art form that can open doors you never thought possible. 🎨✨ Here’s how to master it with the AIDA model! input2: "Networking can be daunting, but a well-crafted cold email can make all the difference! 🤝💌 Here’s my go-to strategy for reaching out for coffee chats and job referrals. A thread 🧵 Self-comment- Personalization is key! Tailor your message to resonate with the recipient. Prompt- 'Generate a customized cold email to ask for a coffee chat and potential job referrals (https://flowgpt.com/explore/3828d40b-4a20-4e84-bc00-460f6f0c751d)'"
input1_ans:
"Cold emailing is an art form that can open doors you never thought possible. 🎨✨ Here’s how to master it with the AIDA model! A thread 🧵

1/ The AIDA model stands for Attention, Interest, Desire, and Action. It’s a proven framework that helps you structure your emails for maximum impact. 

2/ Start with a catchy subject line to grab attention. Think of it as your first impression—make it count! 

3/ Next, spark interest by addressing a pain point or a need your recipient has. Show them you understand their challenges.

4/ Create desire by highlighting the benefits of what you’re offering. Make them envision the positive change it can bring to their life or business.

5/ Finally, include a clear call to action. What do you want them to do next? Make it easy for them to take that step!

Self-comment- The AIDA model is a game changer for crafting compelling emails. If you want to stand out in a crowded inbox, this is the way to go! 

Prompt- 'Write the perfect cold email using the AIDA model. (https://flowgpt.com/explore/395ef80d-c7cc-45e8-88d8-d981558f86e1)' 

Let’s elevate your cold emailing game! 🚀💌 #ColdEmailing #AIDA #EmailMarketing"

Cold emailing is an art form that can open doors you never thought possible. 🎨✨ Here’s how to master it with the AIDA model! A thread 🧵

Self-comment: The AIDA model is a game changer for crafting compelling emails. If you want to stand out in a crowded inbox, this is the way to go!

Prompt: [Write the perfect cold email using the AIDA model.](https://flowgpt.com/explore/395ef80d-c7cc-45e8-88d8-d981558f86e1)
input2_ans:
"Networking doesn't have to be scary! 🌟 A well-crafted cold email can open doors you never knew existed. Here’s my ultimate strategy for reaching out for coffee chats and job referrals. A thread 🧵

Self-comment- Remember, personalization is everything! Make sure your message speaks directly to the recipient's interests and experiences.

1. Start with a warm introduction. Mention a common connection or shared interest.
2. Be clear about your intentions. What do you hope to gain from the chat?
3. Keep it concise and respectful of their time.

Want to craft the perfect email? Use this prompt: 'Generate a customized cold email to ask for a coffee chat and potential job referrals (https://flowgpt.com/explore/3828d40b-4a20-4e84-bc00-460f6f0c751d)' 

Let’s make networking a breeze! 💪✨"
